column4: i have resized my ntfs now i would like to expand the linux fs by that much and gparted doesnt have an option to do this, is there a program that can add freespace to a partition?
Gparted should do that; just make sure the partition you're trying to expand/shrink is unmounted.
You may need to do that from a LiveCD environment.
That's very interesting and I never knew about "gdb", THANK YOU!
